name: Google - Twilight Sparkle
description:
Edit of the Rainbow Dash Google theme, using images of Twilight Sparkle instead. Clearly best pony.

This is only tested on 1920x1080 monitors, it may appear cropped strangely or otherwise cut off on smaller displays. Apologies on the pitiful .jpg screenshot quality, maximum 100kb upload size. Actual images in style are all lossless .png's.
